name: Royale Battle
description:
Premise

Drop from a plane on an island filled with mystery, intrigue and lots of loot to discover. But you're not alone! There are 99 other interested parties trying to beat you to it. Make sure you're the last one standing by outsmarting your opponents with clever tactics. 

Gameplay

In Royale Battle you're fighting against 99 other AI players ranging from very easy to impossible difficulty. If you think you got what it takes to beat the smartest AI on the planet, this is the game for you! 

Credits

This game was part of the 2021 Fall DK30 game jam, hosted by the Day9TV community. I used various asset packs from Humble Bundle and Fanatical for the sounds, music and 3D models. Lastly I want to thank LeadTracker for his endless positivity and help with playtesting.
